captions.text: My favorite champion has to be Wukong.
He can top lane, he can middle lane to counter a lot of APs middle.  And he can actually jungle pretty well.
I feel in love with the ability to juke be using his W.
His ganks are actually pretty sick because you just W from the side brush when you’re all stealth and they have no idea it’s coming.
And if you can manage to screw people’s minds a couple times in a row, and they’re like did he use his W yet?
Is he gone? Is he missing? Or is he just standing there like an idiot?
The plays you can make, they’re just hilarious.
I like teams that stack a lot of CC. So if I’ve got someone like a Ryze or a Morgana middle that can follow up with what I’m doing.
If I’m middle with someone like a Amumu or someone like that, he can Ulti then I go and Ulti, just combo that play one after another.
I think the biggest thing on him is knowing when to go in and use your ultimate...
and just how much damage it does if you stack armor pen and just get a large amount of AD, you’re almost playing like an assassin champion.
You feel like you have a Fiddlesticks ultimate almost. It’s awesome!
There’s a lot of good memories and that’s why I’m playing him so much.
Stealthing in to a team fight, running away, and then baiting it out and then stealthing right back in and just popping your ultimate and just hitting everybody.
I mean, they think they have the advantage...and you bloop right back in.
Hey, I’m Cody “Elementz” Sigfusson from Curse and my favorite champion is Wukong.

title: Pro Player Pick: Elementz Picks Wukong
